question:
Which of the following was the result of the recommendations of new Police Commission set up in 1902?
1. The village chawkidar was placed under the village headman.
2. The supervision and control of the village headman was the responsibility of the Collector or the Deputy Commissioner and his deputies.
3. The post of Deputy Superintendent of Police was created.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Under the new Police Commission set up in 1902, the village chawkidar was placed under the village headman. The supervision and control of the village headman was the responsibility of the Collector or the Deputy Commissioner and his deputies. The post of Deputy Superintendent of Police was created.
